name: PokerFlats
description:
You're an investigative-photographer working for an Alaskan insurance agency when you get a call to visit a remote place called, Poker Flats. Gather photographs of bodies, debris and any paranormal activity found in the area. Get the photos and enough fuel to make it out alive!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Snap Photo

Tab - View Gallery

Shift- Sprint

Space- Jump

Some props and geo are sourced from Sketchfab and sfx grabbed from soundtrap. Animations are sourced from mixamo.
